name: GuineaPlague [RPG Game Jam 2022]
description:
Control a genetically modified guinea pig to spread radiation and cause mayhem in the world! Yay!

How to play:

Avoid crosshairs and use a dash to break your friends out of cages.

After rescuing 70% of guinea pigs in current level, the exit will open.

You can go there and finish the level or stay and rescue the rest of them.

Controls:

WASD - Move

(Hold) Space - Dash

M - Show/Hide directions to cages


Made for Ruch Projektantów Gier GameJam 2022: https://www.facebook.com/events/3099805123681827/

Theme: Radioactive
